about_the_game:
This game is a third-person sports bombing game where you compete with other players using various bombs.


I want to explode more!

For those of you who are interested You have received an invitation from a sports bombing festival.

What is sports bombing?
It is a sport in which you compete against other players using safe bombs.


The following limitations apply to the demo version.
  • Single-player only
  • Score limit 15

Your score and other saved data can be transferred to the full version.
